system.description:
The heroâ€™s dragonmark changes into a larger, more complex pattern and increases in power. The adventurer gains access to a second power listed under their dragonmark and may use Modifiers (but not Epic Modifiers) when activating their powers by paying the additional Power Point cost. If a power is listed with a mandatory Modifier, then the power must always use that Modifier and any contradictory Modifiers cannot be applied.

The character also gets a free reroll when using the skill associated with their dragonmark.
